thread.title: Injuries, visa problems deny Ghana of top players for Canada match, squad named
thread.title_full: Injuries, visa problems deny Ghana of top players for Canada match, squad named

title: Injuries, visa problems deny Ghana of top players for Canada match, squad named
text:
Sports News | 11 October 2015 00:10 CET Injuries, visa problems deny Ghana of top players for Canada match, squad named - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana will be without some of its key players like Asamoah Gyan and Andre Ayew for Tuesdayâ€™s friendly against Canada thanks to injuries and visa problems. 
The Black Stars will also be missing Chrsitian Atsu and Rabiu Mohammed through injury while defenders Baba Rahman, Daniel Amartey as well as striker Richmond Boakye Yiadom could not get visas. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us The importanance of History is it's flow and as it flows it carries to the shores of reality. By: FRANCIS TAWIAH -->D
